categories.name: Public Works
categories.content: <div>Please note that Public Works handles bulk trash services and trash/recycle can replacements. Regular trash collection is processed via a third-party provider. Sewer service is handled by the city’s sewer department. For any issues related to weekly trash collection or sewer service, please contact our finance department at 251-981-6096. Our finance staff will coordinate communication with the other departments. If you need any changes to the trash/recycle cans you currently have, ple
